Describe what are the rules to post in t: Eleza sheria za kutuma katika jumuiya
Name: Jina
Please enter display name, this will be: Tafadhali ingiza jina la kuonyesha, litajazwa moja kwa moja
This note is awaiting moderator approval: Taarifa hii inasubiri idhini ya msimamizi
This deposits your downzap amounts to th: Hii huweka kiasi chako cha downzap kwa wapokeaji waliosanidiwa wa Downzap
Setup your downzap recipient in the pref: Sanidi mpokeaji wako wa downzap katika mapendeleo ya madokezo ya downzap.
It is possible that you could have muted: Inawezekana kwamba unaweza kuwa umenyamazisha mada kutoka kwa menyu ya mapendeleo.
Uh oh! No topics followed yet. Take the: Oo! Hakuna mada zilizofuatiliwa bado. Jaribu mchawi wa ugunduzi?
Uh oh! You have not joined any communiti: Oo! Bado hujajiunga na jumuiya yoyote.
I'm zapddit, a topic-based nostr browser: Mimi ni zapddit, kivinjari kinachotumia mada. Hapa, unafuatilia mada, sio watu.
Click on the button below to copy your p: Bonyeza kitufe hapa chini ili kunakili ufunguo wako binafsi. Weka mahali salama. Usiweke kwa mtu yeyote.
I wish to start my day with a daily dose: Ningependa kuanza siku yangu na dozi ya kila siku ya nostr
I am an ardent Bitcoin nerd: Mimi ni shabiki mkubwa wa Bitcoin
I need the hot goss about nostr clients: Nahitaji habari moto kuhusu wateja wa nostr
Weird stuff (like feet stuff): Vitu vya ajabu (kama vile vitu vya miguu)
Travel with me, answering a few question: Safiri nami, ukijibu maswali machache, huku nikitayarisha
This is the key to access your nostr acc: Huu ndio ufunguo wa kupata akaunti yako ya nostr kwenye wateja wote.
This is how people will refer to you on: Hivyo ndivyo watu watakavyokurejelea kwenye mfumo wa nostr
, I will auto-follow the suggested topic: , Nitafuatilia moja kwa moja mada zilizopendekezwa hapa chini na kuzima sauti moja kwa moja kwa mada zilizo kwenye mwisho.
Don't worry! If you already have a zapdd: Usiwe na wasiwasi! Ikiwa tayari una usanidi wa zapddit, sitauchezea. Sitafuta kufuatilia au kuzima sauti kwa mada yoyote ambayo tayari umefuatilia au kuzima sauti.
Not following anyone yet. May be try fol: Bado sijamfuatilia yeyote. Labda jaribu kumfuatilia mtu?
Missing your language? You can add trans: Je, lugha yako haipo? Unaweza kuongeza tafsiri
Connect to upzap/downzap with minimal ef: Unganisha upzap/downzap kwa juhudi chache sana kutumia
Hide non-zap options for upvote and down: Ficha chaguo zisizo za zap kwa kupigia kura juu na chini
This feature works only when you have Bi: Kipengele hiki kinafanya kazi tu wakati unapokuwa na Bitcoin Connect imehakishwa kwenye mapendeleo yako
% of sats from your zaps will go to this: % ya seti kutoka zaps zako zitaenda kwa msanidi huyu
% ya seti kutoka zaps zako zitaenda kwa msanidi huyu
Set Communities Feed as your default fee: Weka Mlisho wa Jumuiya kama mlisho wako wa msingi
Blur media from people I don't follow: Futa media kutoka kwa watu nisiowafuatilia
npub of the person who will receive the: npub ya mtu ambaye atapokea sats kwa downzaps zako
Enable this option to hide non-zap upvot: Wezesha chaguo hili kuficha upigaji kura wa juu na chini usio wa zap kwa taarifa na maoni.
Never mind about moderator approvals. Sh: Usijali kuhusu idhini za wasimamizi. Onyesha taarifa zote.
Enable this option to see Communities by: Wezesha chaguo hili kuona Jumuiya kwa chaguo-msingi unapokwenda kwenye ukurasa wako wa 'Mlisho Wangu'.
Any post with this tag will not be shown: Post yoyote yenye lebo hii haitaonyeshwa na zapddit kwako
Enable this option to show media only fr: Wezesha chaguo hili kuonyesha media kutoka kwa watu unaowafuatilia pekee.
You are not logged in using your private: Hujafungua kwa kutumia ufunguo wako binafsi. Labda umefungua kwa kutumia kipanuzi cha NIP-07 au ufunguo wako wa umma.
Websocket url of the new relay: Url ya Websocket ya relay mpya
Ingiza url mpya ya avatar hapa...
Ingiza jina lako la kuonyesha hapa...
Ingiza anwani yako ya NIP-05 hapa...
Give some information about yourself: Toa baadhi ya habari kuhusu wewe
Ingiza url ya wavuti yako hapa...
Ingiza anwani yako ya umeme ya LUD16 hapa...
Scan this QR using your Lightning Wallet: Skanisha hii QR kwa kutumia programu yako ya Mkoba wa Umeme
All communities have not yet loaded. Sea: Hakuna jumuiya zimepakia bado. Matokeo ya utafutaji yanaweza kuwa ya sehemu.
Secure login to zapddit requires a Nostr: Kuingia salama kwenye zapddit inahitaji kifaa cha Nostr kufanya kazi. Huna kifaa cha Nostr?
Private/Public Key Login: Kuingia kwa funguo ya faragha / ya umma
Key starting with nsec(for read+write) o: Funguo uanzao na nsec(kusoma+kuandika) au npub(soma-pekee)
Zapddit runs on top of nostr. Click the: Zapddit inatumika kwenye Nostr. Bonyeza kitufe hapa chini kuunda mtumiaji mpya kwenye mfumo wa Nostr.
You can use the same account in all the: Unaweza kutumia akaunti ileile kwenye wateja wote wa Nostr.
Not ready to use a nostr account yet?: Bado hauko tayari kutumia akaunti ya Nostr?
You can have a clean lurker experience u: Unaweza kupata uzoefu safi wa kuchungulia kutumia chaguo hili.
All your settings are saved within brows: Mipangilio yote yako hufanyiwa uhifadhi kwenye uhifadhi wa ndani wa kivinjari na huondolewa unapojitoka.
A default Zap split has been configured: Mgawanyiko chaguomsingi wa Zap umesanidiwa ili kusaidia wasanidi programu na watafsiri, unaweza kuuzima wakati wowote katika Mapendeleo
Media is hidden because you don't follow: Media is hidden because you don't follow this person. Click to see media. You can change this behavior from preferences.
